name: Flags Capitals Coats of Arms
description: Flags and Capitals is a quiz that will help you test your knowledge and learn new things. The base of 196 now known flags, coats of arms and capitals will not let you get bored. Try to achieve the maximum result in each of the three aspects of the game and say with confidence: "I know most, I know everything!". If something does not work right away, do not give up. The game is suitable, both for experienced experts in geography and for beginners. The novice will receive a lot of knowledge, and an easy way to learn flags, coats of arms and capitals. After an incorrect answer, an explanation will appear, which will help to memorize a previously unknown flag, coat of arms or capital. Do you like geography? Do you like the symbols of states? Do you want to learn something new? Looking for confirmation of your unrivaled intelligence? Then our game is for you!
